Title: Gravity
Description: A gripping sci-fi thriller that follows astronauts Dr. Ryan Stone and Matt Kowalski stranded in space after their shuttle is destroyed. As they face dwindling oxygen and the vastness of space, the film explores themes of survival, isolation, and the indomitable human spirit in the face of adversity.
